name: Сube Hell Escape: Bad Neighbor
description:
What kind of cruel secret is your cube neighbor hiding? The more you see him, the more suspicious his behavior becomes! His eyes are so creepy and evil, that no one can stand it! Find out what’s hiding behind this mystery with Сube Hell Escape: Bad Neighbor!
His house may seem beautiful and quiet from outside, but sometimes dark shadows can be seen through his tightly curtained windows… What wild thoughts this strange man is hiding? Beat your way through the back doors or the window and find yourself in a real trouble! Thought that there is nobody home? Unfortunately, the man of the hour IS home, and not only him! Do everything possible to avoid this terrible cube meeting, otherwise you’ll be killed with no mercy!
Hide, find the keys to these strange colorful doors and get to know everything about this sinister person! Search for different hints that can bring you near the clue! Don’t forget to be really attentive, because this cube place is really scary and dangerous (even more than you’ve thought before)! Various brutal monsters are hiding in this horrifying house, and you should do everything possible to survive among them and stop your neighbor’s criminal intrigues! Play evil hide-and-seek with your wild and spiteful neighbor in Сube Hell Escape: Bad Neighbor!
Don’t stop to watch carefully on the map, where you can see your cube neighbor moves! Your mission is clear - hide in every room, because if the walking neighbor sees you, you are dead body immediately!
Сube Hell Escape: Bad Neighbor features:
• Ultimate horror escape game
• Various monsters led by the cruelest one – your neighbor!
• Interesting places to hide
• Difficult cube puzzles in every room
• Beautiful cartoon 3D graphics
Discover the secrets of your cube mad neighbor’s house, find keys to open all doors, understand what kind of evil creatures you deal with and hand him and his criminal affairs over the police ! Do your best and escape successfully from Сube Hell Escape: Bad Neighbor!
